lead_paragraph: Alfredo Hawit, acting head of the confederation which runs soccer in North and Central America and the Caribbean, has agreed to be extradited to the United States to face criminal charges, Swiss authorities said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: North American Soccer Boss Agrees Extradition to U.S. to Face Bribery Charges: Swiss Justice Office
headline.main: North American Soccer Boss Agrees Extradition to U.S. to Face Bribery Charges: Swiss Justice Office

snippet: Alfredo Hawit, acting head of the confederation which runs soccer in North and Central America and the Caribbean, has agreed to be extradited to the United States to face criminal charges, Swiss authorities said on Wednesday....
